en.title: Educational Background
en.description: A glimpse into my academic trajectory and accomplishments.

en.title: H.S.C. in Computer Science
en.description: HSC from the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) serves as a pivotal stage in a student's academic journey. It offers a comprehensive curriculum across various subjects, laying a strong foundation for higher education and professional pursuits.

en.title: Bachelor's in Information Technology
en.description: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology (BE IT) from Mumbai University provides a strong foundation in computer science and its applications. Graduates emerge with a comprehensive understanding of software development, networking, database management, and other IT-related concepts.
